alert.note: Alert for Harlan; Letcher (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 4:34PM EST until January 29 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Accumulating snow is expected above 2500 feet, along with a chance of freezing drizzle. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches are forecast, and ice accumulations less than a tenth of an inch are possible. Winds may also gust around 30 mph. * WHERE...Harlan and Letcher Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Some roadways that cross Pine and Black Mountains that could be affected include US 421, US 119, KY 160, KY 38, and KY 179.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Kentucky can be found by visiting https://goky.ky.gov.
